meanings.definition: To take part in or experience something
meanings.sent1: She partakes in the school play every year.
meanings.sent2: He always partakes in the family game night.
meanings.sent3: The cat partakes in the daily routine by napping on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The tree partakes in the changing seasons, shedding its leaves in autumn.
meanings.sent5: The child eagerly partakes in the birthday cake, savoring every bite.

meanings.definition: To have a share or portion in something
meanings.sent1: They each partake in the responsibility of cleaning their room.
meanings.sent2: The siblings partake in the inheritance left by their grandparents.
meanings.sent3: The dog partakes in the treat jar, sneaking a biscuit when no one is looking.
meanings.sent4: The river partakes in the rainfall, swelling its banks during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The team members equally partake in the victory, celebrating together.
